schema.description: Service provider configuration as defined in RFC 7644 Section 5

authenticationSchemes.description: Authentication schemes supported by the service provider

description.description: A description of the authentication scheme

documentationUri.description: HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the documentation

primary.description: Indicates if this is the primary authentication scheme

specUri.description: HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the specification

maxOperations.description: Maximum number of operations in a single bulk request

maxPayloadSize.description: Maximum payload size in bytes for bulk requests

supported.description: Indicates whether bulk operations are supported
Indicates whether password change operations are supported

documentationUri.description: HTTP-addressable URL pointing to the service provider's documentation

supported.description: Indicates whether ETag-based versioning is supported

maxResults.description: Maximum number of results returned by a filter operation

meta.description: Resource metadata as defined in RFC 7643 Section 3.1

created.description: The timestamp when the resource was created

lastModified.description: The timestamp when the resource was last modified

resourceType.description: The name of the resource type (e.g., User, Group)

version.description:
The version of the resource. Used for ETag-based versioning.
Weak ETags are prefixed with W/

meta.title: ResourceMetadata

supported.description: Indicates whether PATCH operations are supported

schema.title: ServiceProviderConfig

schema.description: Error response as defined in RFC 7644 Section 3.12

status.description: The HTTP status code expressed as a JSON string

schema.title: ErrorResponse

401.description: Authorization failure. The authorization header is invalid or missing

schema.description: Error response as defined in RFC 7644 Section 3.12

status.description: The HTTP status code expressed as a JSON string

schema.title: ErrorResponse
